pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Prime Minister Sanna Marin of Finland | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Trudeau spoke today with Sanna Marin, Prime Minister of Finland, to congratulate her on her recent appointment.

Prime Minister Trudeau and Prime Minister Marin affirmed their commitment to close collaboration on shared priorities such as promoting equality, combatting climate change, protecting the rules-based international order, advancing human rights, and supporting open trade. They also discussed opportunities for cooperation in the Arctic.

The two leaders look forward to working together to further strengthen the excellent relationship between Canada and Finland and to advance their progressive agendas.
